{"id":1442442758,"question_id":29,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1730700209,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1442442758/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"8.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long bit_divide(long long a, long long b) {\n\n        if(a == INT_MIN && b == -1)\n            return INT_MAX;\n    \n        int sign = ((a < 0) ^ (b < 0)) ? -1 : 1;\n\n        a = abs(a);\n        b = abs(b);\n\n        long long quotient = 0;\n\n        for (int i = 31; i >= 0; --i) {\n            if ((b << i) <= a) {\n                a -= (b << i);\n                quotient |= (1LL << i);\n            }\n        }\n\n        return sign * quotient;\n    }\n\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        return bit_divide(dividend, divisor);\n    }\n    \n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
